titles.title: Ranking a Member on a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.
Ranking a Member on a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Without objection, the Chair laid before the House H. Res. 995.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Reform

bill.summary: This resolution ranks a specified Member on the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.
